name: Long Ago, a Star Exploded
description:
CONTROLS: 
Arrow Keys.

After the Big Bang, stars formed into planets, into cells, into humans.

...Or was it the human heart that led to the Big Bang? 

GAME JAM

Made for Rocknight Studio's Trijam #59: The 3-hour game jam, based on the theme, "If you don't hear it, it doesn't exist." 

Can we still hear the vibrations of the Big Bang that made us?

If we can't, did it happen?

CREDITS

  • Developed by fey.earth.
  • Created in Bitsy, an engine by Adam Le Doux. 
  • Music by NikiN, using a tool from mark wonnacott.
